des: "When your freezer is full of pumpkin puree and it's too hot outside for pie or soup, try this lighter tasting and easy pumpkin treat."
ins: Stir together 1 cup boiling water and gelatin in a bowl. Whisk in the brown sugar and cinnamon until the brown sugar is dissolved. Add the pumpkin puree and cold water; stir until mixture is smooth. Cover and chill in refrigerator until set, about 2 hours.
